public static function flush()
Flushes write buffer and stores Zone data.
public static function isAjax()
Tells whether HTTP request is madi with XMLHttpRequest
public static function isGet()
Tells whether HTTP request method is GET
public static function isPost()
Tells whether HTTP request method is POST

public static function run($urls)
Compares route against user supplied urls and executes appropriate controller method.
Implements Front Controller Logic in web.php Framework
public static function write($zone)
Opens Zone for Writing.
Zone class is used to define placeholders in views and layouts
